overview: Prashant (Priyanshu Chatterjee), an ambitious Mumbai media man eager to expose corrupt politicians, and Kiran (Neha Dhupia), a model with her eye on the big time, forge an alliance to help each other get ahead. For a while, the plan seems to be working, but soon, the two are battling each other as they abandon all principle in their quests for success in this cautionary tale co-starring Avtar Gill.
title: Uttaan
